i1.name: Crystal Spires
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Skarner's''' presence spawns [[File:Crystal Spires Minimap.png|16px|link=]] 6 ''Crystal Spires'' at set points across the [[Summoner's Rift|battlefield]]:
* One beside {{uis|Baron Nashor}} pit
* One beside {{uis|Dragon}} pit
* One nearby each buff {{tip|monster|monster's}} camp

After {{tip|minions}} have spawned, a ''Crystal Spire'' can be captured by {{tip|champions}} by standing on it for 2 seconds, Once captured, the ''Crystal Spire'' is owned by the team until contested, and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.

Capturing a ''Crystal Spire'' grants {{tip|sight}} of its radius for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and locks it out from capture for 15 seconds. This also grants {{g|30}} split among its captors or {{g|15}} for a single captor.

'''Skarner''' gains ''Crystal Charge'' while within range of a ''Crystal Spire'' controlled by his team, for {{fd|1.25}} seconds after triggering ''{{ai|Crystal Venom|Skarner}}'', and for {{fd|1.75}} seconds after stinging an enemy champion with ''{{ai|Impale|Skarner}}''.

{{sbc|Crystal Charge:}} '''Skarner''' gains {{pp|70;72;74;76;78;80;82;85;88;91;94;97;100;104;108;112;116;120|formula = 68 + 2 per level up to 7, + 3 per level up to 13, and + 4 per level|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{pp|key=%|43;48;53;58;63;68;73;80;87;94;101;108;115;124;133;142;151;160|formula = 38 + 5 per level up to 7, + 7 per level up to 13, and + 9 per level|color=as}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and restores {{sti|mana|{{as|1% '''maximum''' mana}}}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Skarner's presence spawns File:Crystal Spires Minimap.png 6 Crystal Spires at set points across the Summoner's Rift: * One beside Baron Nashor's pit * One beside Dragon's pit * One nearby each buff monster's camp
After minions have spawned, a Crystal Spire can be captured by champions by standing on it for 2 seconds, Once captured, the Crystal Spire is owned by the team until contested, and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.
Capturing a Crystal Spire grants sight of its radius for 1.5 seconds and locks it out from capture for 15 seconds. This also grants 30 split among its captors or 15 for a single captor.
Skarner gains Crystal Charge while within range of a Crystal Spire controlled by his team, for 1.25 seconds after triggering Skarner's Crystal Venom, and for 1.75 seconds after stinging an enemy champion with Skarner's Impale.
Crystal Charge: Skarner gains 70;72;74;76;78;80;82;85;88;91;94;97;100;104;108;112;116;120 − undefined (based on level) bonus movement speed, 43;48;53;58;63;68;73;80;87;94;101;108;115;124;133;142;151;160% − undefined% (based on level) bonus attack speed and restores 1% maximum mana every 0.5 seconds.
i1.notes: * ''Crystal Charge's'' duration refreshes if it was gained by an ability.

q1.name: Crystal Slash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' slashes around himself, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies.
If ''Crystal Slash'' hits an enemy, the next cast within 5 seconds also deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
Basic attacks {{sti|cdr|reduce}} ''Crystal Slash's'' cooldown by {{fd|0.25}} seconds, increased to 1 second against {{tip|champions}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Skarner slashes around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.
If Crystal Slash hits an enemy, the next cast within 5 seconds also deals bonus magic damage.
Basic attacks reduce Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.25 seconds, increased to 1 second against champions.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|1 to 3}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 20% AD)}}}}

{{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|1 to 3}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 20% AD)}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{as|{{ap|1*2 to 3*2}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 40% AD)}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
q1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage but will not prevent '''Skarner''' from triggering the bonus effect.
* Basic attacks against structures will not trigger the cooldown reduction.

w1.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' gains a {{tip|shield}} for up to 6 seconds.
While the shield persists, '''Skarner''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that doubles over the first 3 seconds.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Skarner gains a shield for up to 6 seconds.
While the shield persists, Skarner gains bonus movement speed that doubles over the first 3 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Initial Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|8 to 16}}%|Increased Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|8*2 to 16*2}}%}}

effects.str: • Shield Strength: % maximum health (+ 80% AP)

• Initial Bonus Movement Speed: %
  • Increased Bonus Movement Speed: %

e1.name: Fracture
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Every time '''Skarner''' triggers ''Crystal Venom'' or stings an enemy with ''{{ai|Impale|Skarner}}'', ''Fracture's'' cooldown is {{sti|cdr|reduced}} by the corresponding '''base''' duration of the disable.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' launches a blast of crystalline energy in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit and {{tip|slows}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, as well as marking them with ''Crystal Venom'' for 5 seconds.
{{sbc|Crystal Venom:}} '''Skarner's''' next [[basic attack]] against a marked target consumes the mark to deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{tip|stun}} them for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Every time Skarner triggers Crystal Venom or stings an enemy with Skarner's Impale, Fracture's cooldown is reduced by the corresponding base duration of the disable.
Active: Skarner launches a blast of crystalline energy in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and slows them for 2.5 seconds, as well as marking them with Crystal Venom for 5 seconds.
Crystal Venom: Skarner's next basic attack against a marked target consumes the mark to deal bonus physical damage and stun them for 1.25 seconds.
e1.notes:
* ''Fracture'' is disabled during {{ai|Impale|Skarner}}.
{{Effect at cast time start}}
* ''Fracture's'' projectile deals {{tip|area damage}}, while the ''Crystal Venom'' on-hit effect deals {{tip|proc damage}}.
* ''Crystal Venom'' triggers even if the attack is {{tip|blocked}} ({{tip|stun}} applies), but not if it's {{tip|dodged}}. The damage of the entire attack is negated in both cases.
** {{Pending for test}}: {{tip|Blind}}.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 20% AP)
  • Slow: %

r1.name: Impale
description:
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' {{tip|root|roots}} the target enemy {{tip|champion}} over the cast time and attempts to impale them with his stinger. Upon impaling the target, he deals {{as|60% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and {{tip|suppression|suppresses}} them for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, during which they are {{tip|true sight|revealed}} and '''Skarner''' can drag them with himself.

Afterwards, the target takes the same damage again.
''Impale's'' drag ignores {{tip|displacement immunity}}.{{tt|*|See notes for additional details}}
'''''Skarner''' is unable to basic attack, cast {{ai|Fracture|Skarner}}, or use {{si|Flash}} during Impale.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Skarner roots the target enemy champion over the cast time and attempts to impale them with his stinger. Upon impaling the target, he deals 60% AD physical damage and bonus magic damage and suppresses them for 1.75 seconds, during which they are revealed and Skarner can drag them with himself.

Afterwards, the target takes the same damage again.
Impale's drag ignores displacement immunity.*
Skarner is unable to basic attack, cast Skarner's Fracture, or use Flash during Impale.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{ap|20 to 100}}  {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{ap|20*2 to 100*2}}  {{as|(+ 120% AD)}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* The target will not take ''Impale's'' secondary damage if the {{tip|suppression}} is removed before the duration ends.
{{Unit-targeted cancel conditions}}** The range cancel distance is 800 units.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not block the {{tip|root}}.
* ''Impale'' is special cased to end prematurely if the target is affected by ''{{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}}'', both for an ally and enemy {{ci|Tahm Kench}} or if '''Skarner''' is teleported by {{ai|Realm Warp|Ryze}}.
** ''Impale'' will not end prematurely if '''Skarner''' enters {{tip|resurrection}}.
* '''Skarner''' cannot use {{tip|Hex-gate|hex-gates}} during ''Impale''.
* While ''Impale'' is active, and for the purposes of direction-conditioned abilities, (e.g. ''{{ai|Petrifying Gaze|Cassiopeia}}, {{ai|Mocking Shout|Tryndamere}}'') '''Skarner''' is considered to be facing in the direction he is moving and not the one his model is facing.
* ''Impale'' applies a small displacement to the target every {{fd|0.25}} seconds whenever they are not close to '''Skarner'''. These displacements do '''not''' apply {{tip|airborne}} and are not {{tt|flagged as displacements|For instance, Mordekaiser R and Sett R do not force-move their target in the classic sense, but pretend to be displacements for interactions like these.}}, meaning that targets who are not {{tip|Cc-immune|immune}} to the {{tip|suppression}} are also never immune to the displacement either. As a consequence, {{tip|displacement immunity}} <u>fails</u> to ignore this movement. ''See the table below.''
{{Skarner Impale Unstoppability Interactions}}
{{ct|cast|spells=true,false,false,false,false}}

• Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)
